name: Scrap Tractor
description:
Created in 48 hours for the 2022 JointJam between UF, UCF, and USF (as well as other Florida universities)

W/S -Accelerate/Decelerate

A/D - Turn Left/Right

F - Tether to object when prompted

Crash into Fuel trucks, Oil barrels, and Tanks to damage and destroy them! If a vehicle is moving you cannot tether it to your tractor.
